attributes.action: instruct the chancellor to pay pensioners the increased rate of 2.5% on all Graduated and SERPS pensions for 2010/2011 and not freeze them as has been done this week.This would be directly in line with the Pre Budget statement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it was stated in the Pre budget Statement that" The Chancellor has committed to increase the state pension for 2010/2011 by a minimum of 2.5%".Now we are being told that Graduated pensions and SERPS pensions are to be frozen for 2010/2011.This is most unfair on those who have tried to plan for pensions in the past
